ygData.subject: Re: SBS Report
ygData.msgSnippet: Oh, didnt know abt that, then I gotta add Dvinn Dagger into my wanted list, including Blacken Medellion, Gross Robe (can also allow me to fight in style, lol)
ygData.messageBody:
Oh, didnt know abt that, then I gotta add Dvinn Dagger into my wanted list,
including Blacken Medellion, Gross Robe (can also allow me to fight in
style, lol) and Staff of Observer....hehehe thx Ah Les!

Btw, I'm using 2HB weap. There are 3 more slot in the hand slots. Other
than the 1st 2 slots which is mean for 1H or 2H weap, what can the other 2
slots be used for beside putting throwing item? How can I activate the
throwing action? If I put a dvinn dagger there and accidentally throw it
out, will it disappear or drop somewhere that I or somebody else can pick
up? Will it be stucked on the mob corpse and disappear? Thx.


Ziltus


On Friday, 02 July, 1999 8:00 PM, Leshrec [SMTP:leshrec@...]
wrote:
> From: "Leshrec" <leshrec@...>
>
> No lah
> The dirk can hold in the throw weapon slot for bonus
> +2dex and 3SVS leh )
> Talking bout runnynose, I also need the medallion so I guess I'm in ) We
> help ziltus get one too and help the vain warriors get the blackened
stuff
> so that they can fight in style )
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> To: 'sg-everquest@onelist.com' <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
> Date: Friday, July 02, 1999 7:34 PM
> Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] SBS Report
>
>
> >From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> >
> >Ah Les, why a sudden change of weap? Or is it for ya necro char? ;)
> >
> >
> >On Friday, 02 July, 1999 6:53 PM, Leshrec [SMTP:leshrec@...]
> wrote:
> >> From: "Leshrec" <leshrec@...>
> >>
> >> Hmm How many SBS do you all need? I can gate to faydark and camp there
> for a
> >> day. I need the dirk that is loaded with DVinn so I can try to get
some
> SBS
> >> too. Prolly i can get 1 or maybe lucky 2..
> >>
> >> -----Original Message-----
> >> From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> >> To: '* Singapore EQ Mailing List' <sg-everquest@onelist.com>

> >> Subject: [sg-everquest] SBS Report
> >>
> >>
> >> >From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> >> >
> >> >Just to inform all kakis abt our SBS hunt in CB.
> >> >
> >> >After killing more than 15 trainers, we only managed to get one SBS
on
> the
> >> >13th trainer. The SBS is given to Einan, our only local kakis
cleric.
> Due
> >> >to time constraint, we are unable to hunt for more. Furthermore,
becoz
> of
> >> >the anti camp thingy that was implemented, the spawning of SBS are
even
> >> >more rare.
> >> >
> >> >Nevertheless I will con't to look for more SBS for local kakis like
> >> >Trifrost, Sereph and other tanks once I go back Faydark.
> >> >
> >> >Tonight is Friday night, as per usual I will be training at NRo derv
> camp
> >> >next to mountain till morning. All kakis who wish to join me are
most
> >> >welcome to do so.
> >> >
> >> >Ziltus.
